For more information visit ACCC Service and Operations Status       about      The Richard J. Daley Library’s IDEA Commons, one of the most popular student spaces on campus, provides access to comfortable seating, spaces to work individually or with a group, and computers with university-licensed software available.  ACCC is on site providing:   Access to printing for students  General support for our services        Google Maps image     Daley Library Helpdesk  Richard J.
